tool.name: afsub_auto_fluorescent_subtraction
tool.command:
#import re
mkdir input_tiff_reg && mkdir input_csv_exposuretime && mkdir output_tiff_afsub &&
#for $tiff in $tiff_reg: #set $filename = re.sub('[^\w\-\.\s]', '_', str($tiff.element_identifier)) ln -s $tiff input_tiff_reg/$filename && #end for
#set $filename = re.sub('[^\w\-\.\s]', '_', str($csv_exposuretime.element_identifier)) ln -s $csv_exposuretime input_csv_exposuretime/${filename}.csv &&
ln -s $json_crop_dictionary ddd_crop.json && ln -s $json_early_dictionary ds_early.json && ln -s $json_late_dictionary ds_late.json &&
python $__tool_directory__/mpleximage_06_0_afsub_auto_fluorescent_subtraction_slidepxscene.py --xcolor $exclude_color --xmarker $exclude_marker --bit8 $bit8

param.name: json_crop_dictionary
param.label: json_crop_dictionary_file_input
param.help: this dictionary is needed, because it maps microscopy scenes to the smaller 20000px * 20000px cropped scenes

param.name: json_early_dictionary
param.label: json_early_dictionary_file_input
param.help: early round quenching marker used for af subtraction

param.name: json_late_dictionary
param.label: json_late_dictionary_file_input
param.help: late round quenching marker used for af subtraction

param.name: exclude_color
param.label: exclude_color_input
param.help: space separated list of microscopy channel identifier that should be excluded from af subtraction, because there is no af, because of the wave length of this channels.

param.name: exclude_marker
param.label: exclude_marker_input
param.help: space separated list of markers that should be excluded from af subtraction.

param.name: bit8
param.label: 8[bit] images
param.help: by default the generated images are like the input images 16[bit] but for presentation itis sometimes nice to have an 8[bit] af subtracted image. set true to generating 8[bit] images instead of 16[bit] images.
